attributes.additional_details: Are bringing up other children that are not blood related or have just started a relationship
attributes.background:
My sons maintance has been affect due to his father living with his girlfriend and her three children.
This should not affect my sons money as now my son misses out. If my son suffers due to other children then add everyone’s wages together.
Our children shouldn’t miss out because there fathers

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about current arrangements for calculating child maintenance, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what changes you would like the Government or Parliament to make to how child maintenance is calculated.
